body: The art style seems to have changed a little and it looks great. The mascot’s design is legit kinda cute, and if this is the new “formula” for Kuroinu Juu, then I’ll gladly sign up for more of that! Excellent work.
This is amazing.  Thank you Black Dog, I can always count on you for 100% high quality shit every time =)  It's even better translated XD  Please put one of those tentacles on her clit next time!!!
have to be honest tho, even if all he does is sailor moon, its high quality shit
I agree with his opinion of the other sailor scouts, especially in the case of Venus
FINALLY !!! Ive waited for YEARS for this day to come !! I REALLY FEEL BLESSED TODAY !! 😂😂😂😍 BLACK BOG YOU RULE !! I LOVE YA BRO PLEASE WE NEED MORE OF YOUR WORK !! 🤗
Wow, I actually have something to be thankful for this thanksgiving
Damn, black dog giving us same old shit for almost 20 years. Maybe its time to hang it up.
